overview: A collection of visual ideograms developed by R.E. Baker and A. Newton during work on the albums Buried Dreams and Man-Amplified. These videos were constructed and engineered using computer technologies at the Anterior Research Station 1988-1993.  1 	The Hacker  2 	Sound Mirror  3 	Man-Amplified  4 	Axiomatic And Heuristic  5 	Fractalize  6 	NYC Overload  7 	Bitstream  8 	Technogeist  9 	Final Program  10 	Voice Recognition Test
title: Clock DVA: Kinetic Engineering
